name: Solo
description: SOLO is the first Agentic DePIN Mining Chain, built on the Optimism Superchain and powered by Caldera and Hyperlane. Creating an ecosystem of AI Agent-centric Transaction and DePIN Mining. SoloChain is a Transaction and DePIN Mining Layer-2 Rollup, allowing users to mine and launch projects with seamless DePIN integrations, equitable mining curves, and AI agentic mechanisms to redefine the internet.
